decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="">The
development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the
following approved plans and documents: CN_001_Location
Plan; CN_002_Existing
and Proposed Site Plan (received 27.03.24);; CN_100_Existing
Plans [ground and first floor]; CN_101_Existing
Plans [roof]; CN_110_Existing
Elevations; CN_200_Proposed
Plans [ground and first floor]; CN_201_Proposed
Plans [roof]; CN_210_Proposed
Elevations; Fire
Safety - Reasonable Exemption Statement (received 28.03.24)</p>

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the side .elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted on the shared boundary with 120 Rowlands Avenue without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey side to front extension incorporating front porch; single storey side to rear extension; external alteration (Demolition of existing garage)
